Experiences.headerSubtitle: What I have done so far
Experiences.point1: Participation in the design and administration of databases in MS SQL Server, ensuring efficiency and security in data storage and access
Experiences.point2: Implementation of business logic and server functionalities using .NET Core, handling interaction with the database and communication with the frontend.
Experiences.point3: Development and optimization of user interfaces with Angular, translating technical requirements into a smooth and effective user experience.
Experiences.point4: Collaboration in evaluating and continuously improving existing processes, increasing software efficiency and enhancing user satisfaction.
Experiences.point5: Design and development of the user interface in Angular, providing a smooth and functional experience for the equipment management and technical staff system.
Experiences.point6: Implementation of business logic in .NET 6 to control data flow between the server and the user interface, enhancing system functionality and efficiency.
Experiences.point7: Creation of the database in SQL Server from scratch, considering the business's specific needs and designing the structure to optimize data storage and retrieval.
